reviewText: This is a fabulous collection - the best of the best by the BBC Drama Collection. I was unfamiliar with many of the stories when I bought the collection but have seen most of them now. (I've only had the collection a week!) I have fallen in love with the characters of "Wives & Daughters" and "Middlemarch".  If you enjoyed the BBC version of "Pride & Prejudice" and felt that it surpassed the recent release starring Keira Knightly, then you will not be disappointed with this collection.  I highly recommend this collection to your DVD library!
